title: Fiancee Be Chosen By The Ring - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Aristocracy   Couple Growth   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Knights   Nobles   Sword And Magic
author: Yue Matsuyuki   茉雪ゆえ
description: Without any interest to socialize nor in romance, Aurora, a daughter of a Countess lives by embroidery alone. Suddenly in the middle of an evening party, an old fashioned ring hits her. Then the knight named Clavis, famous for his name 「Noble of Ice」 declares, 'I will marry the person this ring chooses!'>
